dc:description: Colorless glass with strong green tinge in thicker parts. One fragment of rim and one fragment of side and base, give complete restoration except for center of base. Dulled. No weathering. Material rather poor. Many bubbles and specks of impurities. Broad rim, offset sharply from side, with thickened overhang at edge. Sides straight outsplayed, sloping inward to a curved junction with bottom just outside base ring. Base slightly convex. True base ring, high and outsplayed. The bowl shows marks of rotary polishing.
